definition: to fight bravely/(fig.) to struggle/to work hard
lit. lone army putting up a brave fight (idiom)/fig. (of a person or group of people) struggling hard without support

sentences.english: After eight years of fighting, the Chinese people at lastdefeated the Japanese invaders.
sentences.chinese: 經過八年浴血奮戰，中國人民終於打敗了日本侵略者。

sentences.english: At all hours of the day and night.
sentences.chinese: 在所有小時的日夜奮戰。

sentences.english: The road builders brave the wind and snow on the plateaus all the year round.
sentences.chinese: 築路工人長年奮戰在風雪高原。

sentences.english: Abandoned by the company, Peter's wife, Alice, must deal with it on her own.
sentences.chinese: 彼得被公司拋下不管，其妻艾莉絲惟有孤軍奮戰。

sentences.english: Many fight for their rights, but few fight for what is right.
sentences.chinese: 許多人味自己的權利而奮戰，但極少人未正義而戰。

sentences.english: Finally the Cross-stitch has been finished after almost one months hardworking.
sentences.chinese: 經過將近一個月的奮戰，我的十字繡作品終於完工了。

sentences.english: Women must battle on until they have gained equality.
sentences.chinese: 婦女必須堅奮戰到底，直至取得平等權利。

sentences.english: Remain kylin to fight bravely in an isolated force in this block battlefield.
sentences.chinese: 剩下麒麟在這個街區戰場中孤軍奮戰。

sentences.english: Characterization of the North China People's support and the people's Liberation Army to fight a bloody battle scenes.
sentences.chinese: 刻畫了華北人民支前和人民解放軍浴血奮戰的場景。

sentences.english: Sam:That there's some good in this world, Mr. Frodo. And it's worth fighting for.
sentences.chinese: 這世上一定存在着善良，值得我們奮戰到底。

sentences.english: The anti-Gaddafi forces acknowledge that they could not have done it alone.
sentences.chinese: 反對派也承認，他們不能只靠孤軍奮戰。

sentences.english: The Chinese government does not care what will happen, you are not alone.
sentences.chinese: 中國不會放手不管，你孤軍奮戰。

sentences.english: So thunder and storm, the rage of the sword, the fury of my war.
sentences.chinese: 雷和風暴的咆哮，劍的憤怒，我拼力奮戰。

sentences.english: Ross continues to struggle with Rachel's career and her involvement with Mark.
sentences.chinese: 羅斯繼續同瑞秋的新工作以及馬克奮戰。

sentences.english: And on the slopes of Mount Doom, they fought for the freedom of Middle-earth.
sentences.chinese: 他們在險惡的末日火山，爲中土世界的自由奮戰。

sentences.english: This would leave Nokia itself as virtually the only still developing Symbian devices.
sentences.chinese: 這樣無疑就會在塞班的陣營裏留下諾基亞獨自奮戰。

definition: to do everything one can/to spare no effort/to strive
prepared against war/to prepare for war/warmongering
to resist/to make a stand and fight (against)
to be of one mind/to work as one
